Html:
Dear.

Hello, Excusses, but my english is not good.

I need help in the "harvard - exeter" style.

I want to order in a paragraph citations by "year", for example: text text text (Salas 1998; Alderetes 2000; Paruelo 2008). and not: text text text (Paruelo 2008, Salas 1998, Alderetes 2000).

Do they understand me?

Thanks very much.
